B2 in a way that relates to the emotions: emotionally disturbed Many children have become emotionally disturbed as a result of the abuse they have suffered. He was not an emotionally stable person.
B2 in a way that is full of strong feelings: She spoke emotionally about her experiences as a war correspondent.emotionally charged The interviewer had not realized that was an emotionally charged issue (= causing strong feelings) in this community. See
